query.esql:
FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.cpu.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS cpu_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.cpu.utilization) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state 
| STATS util = 1 - SUM(cpu_util_per_state) WHERE state IN ("idle", "wait") BY time

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.cpu.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS cpu_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.cpu.utilization) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state 
| STATS util = 1 - SUM(cpu_util_per_state) WHERE state IN ("idle", "wait") BY time

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.cpu.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS cpu_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.cpu.utilization) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state 
| STATS util = 1 - SUM(cpu_util_per_state) WHERE state IN ("idle", "wait") BY time

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE `metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m` IS NOT NULL OR metrics.system.cpu.logical.count IS NOT NULL
| STATS `Normalized Load` = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m`) / MAX(metrics.system.cpu.logical.count)  BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| EVAL `Reference` = 1

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE `metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m` IS NOT NULL OR metrics.system.cpu.logical.count IS NOT NULL
| STATS `Normalized Load` = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m`) / MAX(metrics.system.cpu.logical.count)  BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| EVAL `Reference` = 1

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE `metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m` IS NOT NULL OR metrics.system.cpu.logical.count IS NOT NULL
| STATS `Normalized Load` = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m`) / MAX(metrics.system.cpu.logical.count)  BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend)
| EVAL `Reference` = 1

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE `metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m` IS NOT NULL OR metrics.system.cpu.logical.count IS NOT NULL
| STATS `Load (1m)` = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m`),
`Load (5m)` = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.5m`),
`Load (15m)` = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.15m`)
BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend)

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE `metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m` IS NOT NULL OR metrics.system.cpu.logical.count IS NOT NULL
| STATS `Load (1m)` = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m`),
`Load (5m)` = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.5m`),
`Load (15m)` = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.15m`)
BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend)

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE `metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m` IS NOT NULL OR metrics.system.cpu.logical.count IS NOT NULL
| STATS `Load (1m)` = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.1m`),
`Load (5m)` = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.5m`),
`Load (15m)` = AVG(`metrics.system.cpu.load_average.15m`)
BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend)

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.memory.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS memory_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.memory.utilization) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state 
| STATS utilization = SUM(memory_util_per_state) WHERE state == "used" BY time

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.memory.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS memory_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.memory.utilization) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state 
| STATS utilization = SUM(memory_util_per_state) WHERE state == "used" BY time

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.memory.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS memory_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.memory.utilization) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 500, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state 
| STATS utilization = SUM(memory_util_per_state) WHERE state == "used" BY time

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.memory.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS memory_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.memory.utilization) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 100, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state 
| WHERE state IN ("used", "cached", "free")
| STATS utilization = SUM(memory_util_per_state)  BY time, state

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.memory.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS memory_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.memory.utilization) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 100, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state 
| WHERE state IN ("used", "cached", "free")
| STATS utilization = SUM(memory_util_per_state)  BY time, state

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.memory.utilization IS NOT NULL
| STATS memory_util_per_state = AVG(metrics.system.memory.utilization) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 100, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state 
| WHERE state IN ("used", "cached", "free")
| STATS utilization = SUM(memory_util_per_state)  BY time, state

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.filesystem.usage IS NOT NULL
| STATS free = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "free",
reserved = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "reserved",
used = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "used"
BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 200, ?_tstart, ?_tend), attributes.mountpoint
| EVAL `Disk Usage` = TO_DOUBLE(used) / (TO_DOUBLE(free + reserved + used))
| KEEP `Disk Usage`, time, attributes.mountpoint
| LIMIT 10000

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.filesystem.usage IS NOT NULL
| STATS free = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "free",
reserved = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "reserved",
used = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "used"
BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 200, ?_tstart, ?_tend), attributes.mountpoint
| EVAL `Disk Usage` = TO_DOUBLE(used) / (TO_DOUBLE(free + reserved + used))
| KEEP `Disk Usage`, time, attributes.mountpoint
| LIMIT 10000

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
| WHERE metrics.system.filesystem.usage IS NOT NULL
| STATS free = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "free",
reserved = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "reserved",
used = SUM(metrics.system.filesystem.usage) WHERE attributes.state == "used"
BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 200, ?_tstart, ?_tend), attributes.mountpoint
| EVAL `Disk Usage` = TO_DOUBLE(used) / (TO_DOUBLE(free + reserved + used))
| KEEP `Disk Usage`, time, attributes.mountpoint
| LIMIT 10000

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
  | WHERE metrics.system.processes.count IS NOT NULL
  | STATS `Processes Count` = MAX(metrics.system.processes.count) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 100, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.status

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
  | WHERE metrics.system.processes.count IS NOT NULL
  | STATS `Processes Count` = MAX(metrics.system.processes.count) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 100, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.status

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
  | WHERE metrics.system.processes.count IS NOT NULL
  | STATS `Processes Count` = MAX(metrics.system.processes.count) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 100, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.status

embeddableConfig.description: Time (per second) disk spent activated. On Windows, this is calculated as the inverse of disk idle time.
The number of network errors encountered per minute.
The number of packets transferred per minute.
The number of packets dropped per minute.

query.esql:
FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
  | WHERE metrics.system.network.connections > 0
  | STATS `Network Connections` = SUM(metrics.system.network.connections) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 100, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state
  | LIMIT 10000

FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
  | WHERE metrics.system.network.connections > 0
  | STATS `Network Connections` = SUM(metrics.system.network.connections) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 100, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state
  | LIMIT 10000

embeddableConfig.description: The number of connections per state of the network connection.

query.esql:
FROM metrics-hostmetricsreceiver.otel-*
  | WHERE metrics.system.network.connections > 0
  | STATS `Network Connections` = SUM(metrics.system.network.connections) BY time = BUCKET(@timestamp, 100, ?_tstart, ?_tend), state = attributes.state
  | LIMIT 10000
